definitions.title: vb. flow, gush
definitions.body: (NH id., Aram. [[דּוּב]], [[דִּיב]], dob, all used oft. in sense
infr.; Ar. d-a0ba (med. w) melt, dissolve, flow)—only
flow, gush (poet.), of water from the smitten rock Ps 78:20 (‖[[שָׁטַף]]), Ps 105:41 (‖[[הָלַח]]), Is 48:21 (‖[[נׇזַל]]).

Pt. freq. in [[זׇבַת חָלָב וּדְבַשׁ]] ([[אֶרֶץ]]), always of promised land, Ex 3:8, Ex 3:17, Ex 13:5 (all J) Ex 33:3, Nu 13:27, Nu 14:8, Nu 16:13, Nu 16:14 (all JE) De 6:3, De 11:9, De 26:9, De 26:15, De 27:3, De 31:20, Jos 5:6 (D) Le 20:24 (H) Je 11:5, Je 32:22, Ez Eze 20:6, Eze 20:15 (in last two ins. [[ארץ]] LXX Co); [[זׇב עִמְקֵח]] Je 49:4 (fertile valley of Ammon).
fig. flow away = pine away (from hunger) La 4:9.

flow, of issue from woman (all P), Le 15:25 [[יׇזוּב זוֹב דָּמָהּ]] (v. [[ווֹב]]); esp. have an issue (flux, gleet), of woman Le 15:25 and Le 15:19 ([[תִּהְיֶה זׇבָה]]); usu. of man, 2Sa 3:29 (‖[[מְחׂרָע]]); elsewhere P, Le 15:2 [[זׇב מִבִּשָׂרוֹ]]; with cogn. acc. Le 15:33; ordinarily Pt. [[זׇב]] one that has an issue Le 15:4, Le 15:6, Le 15:7, Le 15:8, Le 15:9, Le 15:11, Le 15:12, Le 15:13, Le 15:32 (all P), Le 22:4 (H; ‖[[חָרוּעַ]]); also Nu 5:2 (P; ‖ id.)
